The '''New Tide Anthology''' is a set of interactable notes found in the [[Dryas Wood]], [[Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region]], [[Fontaine]]. Interacting with all of them gives the {{Achievement|"...What New Tide?"}}

The anthology acts as a dictionary for terms used by New Tide members, and was written by [["Trendy Zaytun Peach"]].

==Dialogue==
===New Tide Anthology: Part I===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:"Trendy"
:The supreme virtue.

:"Guileless"
:The most basic virtue, when you simply cannot find any other.

:"Tricky"
:Derogatory term for those cleverer than you.

:"Ruthless"
:Just bravado, no question about it.

:"Child"
:The juvenile form of a hero; the juvenile form of a villain.

:"Children"
:A chaotic group of uncertain composition.

:Compiled by: Trendy Zaytun Peach
{{Dialogue End}}

===New Tide Anthology: Part II ===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:"New Tide"
:Our tomorrow.

:"Ley Lines"
:The opposite of New Tide. Nothing at all to do with tomorrow.

:"Order"
:Most commonly heard when insisting that others do what they're told: "Please act in an orderly manner."

:"Principles"
:Commonly collocates with "flexible": flexible principles, principles are flexible.

:"Family"
:A chaotic but related group.

:Compiled by: Trendy Zaytun Peach
{{Dialogue End}}

===New Tide Anthology: Part III===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:Compiling...

:Compiled by: Trendy Zaytun Peach
{{Dialogue End}}
